## Destroy Any Tile [mkwcat]

Destroy any tile in the game, or convert to a coin block if you're small.

This code is for New Super Mario Bros. Wii. Many revisions may be untested.

<details>
<summary>PAL Rev 1</summary>

```hex
C206DA14 00000004
77C00001 40820014
77C0021A 40820010
73C0A871 48000008
7C000000 60000000
0406DA50 38000002
C20885CC 00000004
8811000D 2C000002
4182000C 28180001
4800000C 38000000
9811000D 60000000
```
</details>
